td.content: s:a female aged 75 years presents with moderate b/l leg pain. patient also reports moderate denial of any trauma, moderate fever, Blood. denies any smoking Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol o:Height 164 cm, Weight 72.2 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 116, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17, Skin = pale mucous membrane, Skin = pallor a:Sickle Cell Anemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to hematology.

s:pt presents with increased moderate denial of any trauma, moderate fever and moderate b/l leg pain over 3 years. she is a 75 YO f retired. o:Height 163 cm, Weight 69.7 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15, Skin = pale mucous membrane, Skin = pallor a:Sickle Cell Anemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed dilaudid - 0.015 mg/kg every 3 hours, and ordered Blood transfusion - circulatory system.

s:patient presents with moderate denial of any trauma, moderate b/l leg pain and moderate fever. pt is a female aged 77 ys. Patient does not smoke denies any alcohol use o:Height 164 cm, Weight 71.7 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, Skin = pale mucous membrane, Skin = pallor a:Sickle Cell Anemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed dilaudid - 0.015 mg/kg every 3 hours, and ordered CBC, Hemoglobin electrophoresis.
